title: Cheesy Picante Potatoes
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Cheddar Cheese Soup
instructions: Stir the soup, picante sauce and garlic in a 10-inch skillet. Add the potatoes and heat through over medium heat. Sprinkle with paprika and cilantro. Serve with additional picante sauce, if desired.
